sentences.en: A depositor draw a lot money from the bank.
sentences.cn: 一位存款人从银行支取了好多钱.

sentences.en: A depositor is a person who deposits money in a bank.
sentences.cn: 存款人是指将钱存入银行的人.

sentences.en: Any person or organization that keeps money in a band is a depositor.
sentences.cn: 把钱存入银行的任何个人或组识都叫存户.

sentences.en: Certain transactions recorded by the depositor may not have been records by the bank.
sentences.cn: 某些经济业务存户记录了,而银行尚未记录.

sentences.en: Interest in banking, is the rate of return, or the return itself, paid to the depositor.
sentences.cn: 在银行业务中, 利率就是支付给储户的收益率或者报酬.

sentences.en: Notice that the St. Louis memo tiptoes around the question of telling a depositor that he has a demand deposit while telling the rest of the country that he has a time deposit.
sentences.cn: 请注意，圣路易斯储备银行的备忘录一直在一个问题上遮遮掩掩，那就是把存款人的活期存款说成定期存款，欺骗国人。

sentences.en: Subsequently, other countries followed, one after another out of the depositor protection.
sentences.cn: 随后, 其他各国萧规曹随, 纷纷出台了对储户的保护措施.

sentences.en: The deposit amount is set by the depositor and the accrued interests are paid by installment.
sentences.cn: 存款金额由储户自定,分期支取本息.

sentences.en: The depositor may retrieve the deposit at any time.
sentences.cn: 第三百七十六条寄存人可以随时领取保管物.

sentences.en: The depositor positively positioned the preposition in that position on purpose.
sentences.cn: 储户有意确信地介词放置在那个位置.

sentences.en: The depositor shall pay the safekeeping fee to the depository in accordance with the contract.
sentences.cn: 第三百六十六条寄存人应当按照约定向保管人支付保管费.

sentences.en: The former materially raised depositor's interest income level, the latter is opposite.
sentences.cn: 前者实质上提高了存款人的利息收益水平, 后者则相反.

sentences.en: The GRP Wined system is equipment that is product aquarium depositor and pipeline.
sentences.cn: 玻璃钢缠绕系统是生产玻璃钢储罐及管道的设备.

sentences.en: The main objective is to protect the depositor.
sentences.cn: 主要的目标是保护存款人.

sentences.en: The number of our depositor is growing every day.
sentences.cn: 我行存款人的数量每天都在增长.

sentences.en: You'll have a deposit certificate in the name of the depositor.
sentences.cn: 那就要一张以储户名字开立的定期存单.

words.tran_cn: 受托人；受托公司；储藏所

trans.tran_cn: 存放人，存款人，寄托者，沉淀器
trans.tran_en: someone who puts money in a bank or other financial organization
